editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Greeting to Saint George, "Hail to You" (ff. i v - iii v); Prayer of the Covenant, ኪዳን፡ ዘነግህ፡ (f-13r); Mystagogia, Tǝmhǝrtä Ḫǝbu‘at, ትምህርተ፡ ኅቡዓት፡; (13r-22v); Image of Mary of Edom, መልክአ፡ ኤዶም (f-27r); List of the Movable Feast Days (); Image of the Nativity of Mary, መልክአ: ልደታ: ለማርያም: (-39r); Prayer to Jesus Christ, “Guard me,” ኦ: እግዚእየ: ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ: ዕቀበኒ: (f-62r); Image of the Passion of Christ, መልክአ፡ ሕማማት, cf. Chaîne Répertoire 374 (f-70v); Prayer to Jesus Christ, “For the sake of Mary, Your Mother,” (incipit: በስመ: አብ: ወወልድ:..ኦ: እግዚእየ: ኢየሱስ: ክርስቶስ: ወልደ: እግዚአብሔር: ሕያው: በእንተ: ማርያም: ወላዲትከ: ርድአኒ: ሊተ: ለገብርከ:) Praise of the Beloved in Honor of Mary, ስብሐተ፡ ፍቁር፡ (f-74v); Praise of the Beloved in Honor of Saint George, ስብሐተ፡ ፍቁር፡, Chaîne, Répertoire 229 (f-82r); Excerpt from Praise of the Beloved in Honor of Takla Haymanot and Ewostatawos (); Praise of the Beloved in Honor of Saint George, ስብሐተ፡ ፍቁር፡ (incipit: ...ዘወገረከ: ደብረ: ይድራስ: ሰላም: ሰላም: ሰላም: ለከ: ጊዮርጊስ:: ሰ ናሁ: ወጠንኩ: ዝክረ: ውዳሴከ: ባሕቱ: ምንትኑ: እሰምየከ: ወምንት: ውእቱ: አምሳሊከ:..) (f-85v); (secondary owner listed 13r, 44v, passim)
